page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: AT PRESENT IN THE NEW MALDEN AREA THERE IS LITTLE UNEMPLOYMENT.MOST SCHOOL LEAVERS FIND JOBS QUICKLY EITHER IN THE LOCAL SHOPS,OFFICES OR LIGHT INDUSTRY OR IN THE GREATER LONDON AREA. FATHERS OF FAMILIES TEND TO BE THE MAIN WAGE EARNERS ALTHOUGH 32% OF THE MOTHERS WORK OUTSIDE THE FAMILY HOME, EITHER ON A FULL OR PART-TIME BASIS.THE MAJORITY OF MOTHERS,HOWEVER,ARE HOUSEWIVES WHOSE MAIN OCCUPATION IS RUNNING THE FAMILY HOME. PEOPLE IN OUR AREA OCCUPY A WIDE VARIETY OF JOBS RANGING FROM SHOPKEEPERS TO INTERPRETERS,MANY OF THE JOBS FALLING WITHIN THE LOWER MIDDLE CLASS BRACKET. A SAMPLE SURVEY OF HEADS OF HOUSEHOLD EMPLOYMENT MAY BE FOUND ON THE NEXT PAGE.
